%% Do not edit unless you really know what you are doing.
\documentclass[english]{article}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[latin9]{inputenc}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}
\[
\underset{X_{n\times k}}{\underbrace{\left(\begin{array}{cccc}
x_{11} & \dots & \dots & x_{1k}\\
x_{21} & x_{22} & \dots & x_{2k}\\
\vdots &  & \ddots\\
\vdots\\
\\
x_{n1} & \dots & \dots & x_{nk}
\end{array}\right)}}=\underset{U_{n\times n}}{\underbrace{\left(\begin{array}{ccccc}
\\
\vdots & \vdots & \vdots & \vdots & \vdots\\
u_{1} & u_{2} & \dots & \dots & u_{n}\\
\vdots & \vdots & \vdots & \vdots & \vdots\\
\\
\\
\end{array}\right)}}\underset{\Sigma_{n\times k}}{\underbrace{\left(\begin{array}{cccc}
\sigma_{1} & 0 & \dots & 0\\
0 & \sigma_{2} & \dots & 0\\
\vdots &  & \ddots\\
\vdots &  &  & \sigma_{r}\\
0 & \dots & \dots & 0\\
0 & \dots & \dots & 0
\end{array}\right)}}\underset{V'_{k\times k}}{\underbrace{\left(\begin{array}{cccc}
\dots & v_{1} & \dots & \dots\\
\dots & v_{2} & \dots & \dots\\
\vdots & \vdots & \vdots & \vdots\\
\dots & v_{k} & \dots & \dots
\end{array}\right)}}
\]

\[
\underset{X_{n\times k}}{\underbrace{\left(\begin{array}{cccc}
x_{11} & \dots & \dots & x_{1k}\\
x_{21} & x_{22} & \dots & x_{2k}\\
\vdots &  & \ddots\\
\vdots\\
\\
x_{n1} & \dots & \dots & x_{nk}
\end{array}\right)}}=\underset{U_{n\times r}}{\underbrace{\left(\begin{array}{cccc}
\\
\vdots & \vdots & \vdots & \vdots\\
u_{1} & u_{2} & \dots & u_{r}\\
\vdots & \vdots & \vdots & \vdots\\
\\
\\
\end{array}\right)}}\underset{\Sigma_{r\times r}}{\underbrace{\left(\begin{array}{cccc}
\sigma_{1} & 0 & \dots & 0\\
0 & \sigma_{2} & \dots & 0\\
\vdots &  & \ddots\\
\vdots &  &  & \sigma_{r}
\end{array}\right)}}\underset{V'_{r\times k}}{\underbrace{\left(\begin{array}{cccc}
\dots & v_{1} & \dots & \dots\\
\dots & v_{2} & \dots & \dots\\
\dots & v_{r} & \dots & \dots
\end{array}\right)}}
\]

\[
\underset{X_{n\times k}}{\underbrace{\left(\begin{array}{cccc}
x_{11} & \dots & \dots & x_{1k}\\
x_{21} & x_{22} & \dots & x_{2k}\\
\vdots &  & \ddots\\
\vdots\\
\\
x_{n1} & \dots & \dots & x_{nk}
\end{array}\right)}}\approx\underset{U_{n\times2}}{\underbrace{\left(\begin{array}{cc}
\\
\vdots & \vdots\\
u_{1} & u_{2}\\
\vdots & \vdots\\
\\
\\
\end{array}\right)}}\underset{\Sigma_{2\times2}}{\underbrace{\left(\begin{array}{cc}
\sigma_{1} & 0\\
0 & \sigma_{2}
\end{array}\right)}}\underset{V'_{2\times k}}{\underbrace{\left(\begin{array}{cccc}
\dots & v_{1} & \dots & \dots\\
\dots & v_{2} & \dots & \dots
\end{array}\right)}}
\]

\end{document}
